post_content:
1909 T206 Griffith batting-off-center left to right. Was concerned possibly trimmed, but the card measures. Refund available on the card if not satisfied. Sold.

S/h outside of California, Oregon and the state of Washington is now $4.75. In the matter of shipping to California, Oregon and Washington, the s/h because of the distance from Pittsburgh is $5.00. If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
